ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有items取前10个结果
if(JSON.parse(result).items){
json=JSON.parse(result).items.slice(0,10);}

//加载作者搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/search?keyword='+key+'&type=2&page='+page+'&searchType=2&sortMode=DESC'));

//判定json里是否有items取前10个结果
if(json1.items){
json2=json1.items
}

//书名搜索列表与作者搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

//返回json字符串
result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: J.select('#intro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>

ruleSearch.name: .result-game-item-title-link@text<js>var 离=['replace','trim'];(function(秋,苁){var 草=function(扬){while(--扬){秋['push'](秋['shift']());}};草(++苁);}(离,0x1a2));var 秋=function(莲,苏){莲=莲-0x0;var 苁=离[莲];return 苁;};String(result)[秋('0x0')](/^\s*《|》\s*$|TXT下载.*/gi,'')[秋('0x1')]();</js>

ruleContent.content: id.content@tag.p@html##手机阅读访问.*书架功能更好用.

<js>
var sid= result.match(/siteid:'(.*)'/)[1];
var url = result.match(/url:'(.*)'/)[1];
var option = JSON.stringify({"method":"POST","body":"siteid="+sid+"&url="+url})
org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax('https://www.30sy.com/novelsearch/chapter/transcode.html,'+ option))
</js>
